languages.text: "Это и для меня загадка, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Думаю — и даже предположить не могу. Но в последнее время... В последнее время он словно сам не свой. Бормочет под нос какие-то жуткие стишки про кровь да про судьбу. Мне даже показалось, что он чего-то сильно ждет, но чего я так и не поняла".

traits.locale_text: "Это и для меня загадка, звездн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Думаю — и даже предположить не могу. На ум приходит только его жуткая песенка собственного сочинения. Но она совсем дурацкая, ее невозможно воспринимать всерьез... Нет-нет, не могу оскорблять ею ваш слух".

languages.text: "It's a mystery to me too, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. I think about it and I can't even imagine why. But lately... lately, it's like he's not himself. He keeps muttering these awful rhymes about blood and fate. And it's like he's waiting for something, but I just can't understand what."
languages.original_text: "Это и для меня загадка, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Думаю — и даже предположить не могу. Но в последнее время... В последнее время он словно сам не свой. Бормочет под нос какие-то жуткие стишки про кровь да про судьбу. Мне даже показалось, что он чего-то сильно ждет, но чего я так и не поняла".

traits.locale_text: "It's a mystery to me too, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. I think about it and I can't even imagine why. But lately... Lately, it's like he wasn't himself. Muttering some creepy poems about blood and fate. I even had a feeling he was really waiting for something, but I never understood what."

"It's a mystery to me too, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. I think about it and I can't even imagine why. But lately... Lately, it's like he wasn't himself. Muttering some creepy poems about blood and fate. I even had a feeling he was really waiting for something, but I never understood what."

"It's a mystery to me too, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. I think about it and I can't even imagine why. But lately... lately, it's like he's not himself. Kept muttering some creepy poems about blood and fate. I even got the feeling he was really waiting for something, but I never understood what."

"It's a mystery to me too, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. I think about it and I can't even imagine why. But lately... lately, it's like he's not himself. Kept muttering some creepy poems about blood and fate. I even got the feeling he was really waiting for something, but I never understood what."

"It's a mystery to me too, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. I think about it and I can't even imagine why. But lately... lately, it's like he's not himself. He keeps muttering these awful rhymes about blood and fate. And it's like he's waiting for something, but I just can't understand what."

"It's a mystery to me too, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. I think about it and I can't even imagine why. But lately... lately, it's like he's not himself. He keeps muttering these awful rhymes about blood and fate. And it's like he's waiting for something, but I just can't understand what."

languages.text: 「それは私にとっても謎なのです、天の{mf|君|姫}。考えてみても、なぜなのかまったく想像がつきません。ですが最近は…最近の彼は、まるで別人のようです。血や運命についての不気味な詩をずっとぶつぶつと呟いてばかりで。何かを待っているようなのですが、さっぱり分からないんです…」
languages.original_text: "It's a mystery to me too, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. I think about it and I can't even imagine why. But lately... lately, it's like he's not himself. He keeps muttering these awful rhymes about blood and fate. And it's like he's waiting for something, but I just can't understand what."

traits.locale_text: 「それは私にとっても謎なのです、天の{mf|君|姫}。考えてみても、なぜなのかまったく想像がつきません。ですが最近は…最近の彼は、まるで別人のようです。血や運命についての不気味な詩をずっとぶつぶつと呟いてばかりで。何かを待っているようなのですが、さっぱり分からないんです…」

languages.text: "Orası benim için de bir muamma Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}. Düşünüyorum ancak akıl sır erdiremiyorum. Fakat son zamanlarda... Sanki kendinde değil. Sürekli kan ve kaderle ilgili korkunç şeyler mırıldanıyor. Bir şeyi bekliyor gibi ama ne olduğunu bir türlü anlayamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "It's a mystery to me too, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. I think about it and I can't even imagine why. But lately... lately, it's like he's not himself. He keeps muttering these awful rhymes about blood and fate. And it's like he's waiting for something, but I just can't understand what."

traits.locale_text: "Orası benim için de bir muamma Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}. Düşünüyorum ancak sebebini akıl sır erdiremiyorum. Fakat son zamanlarda... Sanki kendisi değil. Sürekli kan ve kaderle ilgili korkunç şeyler mırıldanıyor. Bir şeyi bekliyor gibi ama ne olduğunu bir türlü anlayamıyorum."

languages.text: «Para mí también es un misterio, mi Señor{mf||a} Celestial. Por más que lo pienso, no consigo imaginar por qué. Pero, últimamente... últimamente, es como si no fuera él mismo. No deja de murmurar unas rimas terribles sobre la sangre y el destino. Y es como si estuviera esperando a algo, pero no entiendo a qué».
languages.original_text: "It's a mystery to me too, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. I think about it and I can't even imagine why. But lately... lately, it's like he's not himself. He keeps muttering these awful rhymes about blood and fate. And it's like he's waiting for something, but I just can't understand what."

traits.locale_text: «Para mí también es un misterio, mi Señor{mf||a} Celestial. Por más que lo pienso, no consigo imaginar por qué. Pero, últimamente... últimamente, es como si no fuera él mismo. No deja de murmurar unas rimas terribles sobre la sangre y el destino. Y es como si estuviera esperando a algo, pero no entiendo a qué».

languages.text: “我也是一头雾水，来自上界的大人。我也在想这个问题，但却根本找不到答案。不过，最近……最近他就像变了个人一样。他说出的那些可怕的俏皮话，始终都和鲜血、命运有关。不仅如此，他就像是在等待着什么一样，但我想不明白他究竟在等待什么。”
languages.original_text: "It's a mystery to me too, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. I think about it and I can't even imagine why. But lately... lately, it's like he's not himself. He keeps muttering these awful rhymes about blood and fate. And it's like he's waiting for something, but I just can't understand what."

traits.locale_text: “我也是一头雾水，来自上界的大人。我也在想这个问题，但却根本找不到答案。不过，最近……最近他就像变了个人一样。他说出的那些可怕的俏皮话，始终都和鲜血、命运有关。不仅如此，他就像是在等待着什么一样，但我想不明白他究竟在等待什么。”

languages.text: « Je n'en ai pas la moindre idée, Votre Céleste Seigneurie. J'ai beau y réfléchir, je ne me l'explique pas. Cela étant dit... je ne le reconnais plus, depuis quelque temps. Il n'arrête pas de marmonner ces horribles litanies à propos de sang et de fatalité. On croirait presque qu'il attend quelque chose, mais quoi ? Le mystère reste entier... »
languages.original_text: "It's a mystery to me too, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. I think about it and I can't even imagine why. But lately... lately, it's like he's not himself. He keeps muttering these awful rhymes about blood and fate. And it's like he's waiting for something, but I just can't understand what."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en ai pas la moindre idée, Votre Céleste Seigneurie. J'ai beau y réfléchir, je ne me l'explique pas. Cela étant dit... je ne le reconnais plus, depuis quelque temps. Il n'arrête pas de marmonner ces horribles litanies à propos de sang et de fatalité. On croirait presque qu'il attend quelque chose, mais quoi ? Le mystère reste entier... »

languages.text: "Mir ist das auch ein Rätsel, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}. Ich denke darüber nach und kann mir den Grund nicht erklären. Aber ... seit einiger Zeit ist er nicht mehr er selbst. Er murmelt ständig diese schrecklichen Reime über Blut und Schicksal. Er scheint auf etwas zu warten, aber ich weiß einfach nicht, worauf."
languages.original_text: "It's a mystery to me too, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. I think about it and I can't even imagine why. But lately... lately, it's like he's not himself. He keeps muttering these awful rhymes about blood and fate. And it's like he's waiting for something, but I just can't understand what."

traits.locale_text: "Mir ist das auch ein Rätsel, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}. Ich denke darüber nach und kann mir den Grund nicht erklären. Aber ... seit einiger Zeit ist er nicht mehr er selbst. Er murmelt ständig diese schrecklichen Reime über Blut und Schicksal. Er scheint auf etwas zu warten, aber ich weiß einfach nicht, worauf."
